Support creating tags in the UI (save them globally per user)

card.desc:
This is a big one, but an important one:

‌

1. each line in the table need to be able to edit the tags.
2. the table needs to support “group by tag” functionality
3. anything missing a that tag value goes into “others”
4. there should be a button to “create a chart out of this grouping” to be added to the charts section
5. need to support (currently, only) deleting the custom charts.

Create a Portfolio "Share Link"

card.desc:
Need a functionality of creating a “sharable view” to be able to send a link to friends.

The sub-features could be:

1. Let user select static view (snapshot) vs live view that we can keep checking out to see updates
2. Let user select if real values are hidden or not (ILS / only %)
3. Allow user to view and delete past created links
4. The viewable link should have a cleaner and simpler design, without seeing all the edit buttons
   ‌

- let’s avoid “edit” for the time-being
- let’s avoid “view permissions” management
- let’s wait with the “edit permissions” (for collaborating with your wife)
